ai-iti49:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti49:2.1_0: “Overcome by two misconceptions, mendicants, some gods and humans get stuck, some overreach,
ai-iti49:3.1_0: And how do some get stuck?
ai-iti49:3.2_0: Because of love, delight, and enjoyment of existence, when the Dhamma is being taught for the cessation of existence, the minds of some gods and humans are not eager, confident, settled, and decided.
ai-iti49:3.3_0: That is how some get stuck.
ai-iti49:4.2_0: Some, becoming horrified, repelled, and disgusted with existence, delight in ending existence:
ai-iti49:4.3_0: ‘When this self is annihilated and destroyed when the body breaks up, and doesn’t exist after death:
ai-iti49:4.4_0: that is peaceful, that is sublime, that is reality.’
ai-iti49:5.1_0: And how do those with vision see?
ai-iti49:5.2_0: It’s when a mendicant sees what has come to be as having come to be.
ai-iti49:5.3_0: Seeing this, they are practicing for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding what has come to be.
ai-iti49:5.4_0: That’s how the eye is negligent.”
ai-iti49:5.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti49:6.1_0: “Those who see what has come be to as having come to be,
ai-iti49:6.3_0: are freed in accord with the truth,
ai-iti49:6.4_0: with the ending of craving for continued existence.
ai-iti49:7.1_0: They completely understand what has come to be,
ai-iti49:7.2_0: rid of craving for rebirth in this or that state,
ai-iti49:7.3_0: with the disappearance of what has come to be,
ai-iti49:7.4_0: a mendicant does not come back to future lives.”
ai-iti49:8.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti49:9.1_0: Two faculties, with two faculties and with respect,
ai-iti49:9.3_0: and two on anger-eating paths are never transfer.
ai-iti49:10.2_0: The fifth sun is the fifth thing.
ai-iti49:10.3_0: born in the elements of the Relics,
ai-iti49:10.4_0: and with training, and living in seclusion,
ai-iti49:10.5_0: (They are) wrong views with wrong views,
ai-iti49:10.7_0: The Book of the Twos is finished.
